attributes.action: Stop the Heathrow Airport Congestion Charging zone planning
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the Tax paying car driver pay further charges for improving Bus, Train and London Transportation System.  The Congestion Charge zone in London city started with £5.00 a day and increased to £8.00.  Now they have extended the Congestion Charge area also.  Please have your say before the Heathrow CC Zone is setup.  The is another petition available for the london city & manchester city CC Zone, so please vote and have your say.
